deletion_confirmation_question:
Are you sure you want to delete the account of {{firstName}} {{lastName}}? The following steps will be performed:

1. Deleting the user account from the authentication system
2. Anonymizing all personal data
3. Deleting the profile picture
4. Deleting motivation letters
5. Replacing the certificates with anonymized versions

This process cannot be undone. Do you want to proceed with deleting with deleting {{firstName}} {{lastName}}'s account?
